headline: Constellation Energy Opens Shelf Registration As Board And Growth Plans Evolve
summary: Constellation Energy, NasdaqGS:CEG, has filed an omnibus shelf registration that would allow it to issue common and preferred stock, depositary shares, and debt securities. The filing comes shortly before the company’s upcoming Q4 earnings report. The move follows recent changes to Constellation Energy’s Board of Directors. Constellation Energy, NasdaqGS:CEG, enters this development with a current share price of $293.8 and a 1-year return of 10.4%. Over the past 3 years, the stock has...
